wikipedia_page.main: Ellen Eliza Blight (1833-1850), also known as Helen Bright, was an English lion tamer, known as "The Lion Queen", who was killed by a tiger while working in her uncle George Wombwell's menagerie, aged 17. Her shocking death made her a media sensation.

response: *Ellen Blight (1833/34-1850), English lion-tamer killed by a tiger
* Ellen Blight (1833/1834–1850), English lion-tamer killed by a tiger
